recipe.title: Coconut Lime Cauliflower Rice Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon ; coconut oil, or preferred cooking oil

steps.step: In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower until it reaches your desired “rice” consistency.
In a large skillet over medium heat, heat oil, then add cauliflower rice and let cook for 5 minutes., stirring occasionally.
Add coconut milk, lime juice and lime zest, combine well and allow to cook until the liquid has evaporated.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower until it reaches your desired “rice” consistency.

Add coconut milk, lime juice and lime zest, combine well and allow to cook until the liquid has evaporated.
